content:
I'd be happy to help you add those to the list.

What can you tell me about the winter clothing you bought at Macy's? Do you remember what specific items you purchased, such as coats, sweaters, gloves, or hats? And do you recall the approximate prices or discounts you got during the Friends and Family sale?

You can give me as much or as little information as you remember, and I'll help you add it to your list.
